specs.title: Color theme
specs.description: Select a color theme to suit your needs.

specs.title: Header logo image
specs.description:
Specify the website logo. It will be shown at the left of the header (above on mobile devices).
A 24 bit PNG with transparent background is preferred.
Note: make the image rectangular, in a 2:1 aspect ratio. Wider images will break the layout. You might need to split your logo if it contains a long text sentence.

specs.title: Alternate menu selectors
specs.description:
Specify the CSS selectors from the primary menu to be shown on the alternate menu bar using one line per selector.
Use relative selectors E.G. .main_menu_item[data-module='posts'] or by id, E.G. #bardcommerce_landing_link.

specs.title: Hide the home slider?
specs.description:
By default, the home slider will be shown on the home page if posts of the specified category in the Posts settings are published.

Note: posts are ordered by title, not by publishing date, in order to give admins full control of the order of posts to be shown.

specs.title: Slider height
specs.description: You can specify the slider height here. Set it to 0 (zero) or leave it empty for automatic height.

specs.title: Slider cache time
specs.description:
Cache Enter the amount of hours the slider markup should be cached.
Leave empty or set a zero to skip it.

specs.title: Slider cache version
specs.description: Cache Bump this number to force cache regeneration.

specs.title: Pre-content sections
specs.description:
Specify the sections you want to show before the contents, using one per line.
Section keys: faqs, features, mobile and staff.

specs.title: Post-content sections
specs.description:
Specify the sections you want to show after the contents, using one per line.
Section keys: faqs, features, mobile and staff.

specs.title: Left part markup
specs.description: Type the markup to show at the left of the screenshot.

specs.title: Phone screenshot
specs.description: Select the image to show as screenshot. It will be shown at the right of the section.

specs.title: Section height
specs.description: Specify a height for the section. Default: 400px.

specs.title: Section title
specs.description: Specify a title for the section.

specs.title: Staff section title
specs.description:
Use a <h2> tag to specify the title, then any text below as subtitle.
You should add a link to the staff page/post if defined.
